name: Bottled Lightning
description:
The battery factory is busy busy busy during the heavy thunderstorm. Gotta catch all those gigawatts! But the main generator is busted, so don’t forget to regularly replace the battery in the backup generator in the basement.

Control your two factory workers, making sure the batteries are delivered through the build pipeline. Batteries must be charged, packaged and delivered onto the cargo train.

Controls:

Left worker: WASD

Right worker: IJKL
